features.featureTitle: Save the uploaded image (IMG_0282.jpeg) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/tung-character.dim_300x300.png and use it as the central clickable character in the TungTungGame component (frontend/src/components/games/TungTungGame.tsx). Replace any previously programmatically drawn drum/stick figure with this image rendered on the canvas. The image should pulse/scale slightly when idle and shake/flash on click, consistent with the existing clicker game hit effect mechanics.
